Package sorcer.core.exertion

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AltExertion
    The alternative Exertion that executes sequentially a collection of optional exertions.
    ContextTask
    The SORCER context task extending the basic task implementation Task.
    ExertionEnvelop  
    ExertionMethodFactory
    This class creates instances of appropriate subclasses of ServiceMethod.
    Jobs  
    LoopExertion
    The loop Exertion executes its target exertion while its condition is true.
    NetJob  
    NetTask
    The SORCER service task extending the abstract task Task.

    The SORCER object job extending the basic job implementation Job.
